entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
